description: Dates at 16-day intervals starting at the beginning of a leap year.
mathematica: Table[DateValue[DayPlus[{2015,12,31},16n],"Day"],{n,100}](* The program uses the DateValue function from Mathematica version 10 *) (* _Harvey P. Dale_, May 14 2016 *)
author: John Daly (john.daly(AT)cc2smtp.NRCan.gc.ca)
